content.body: ntim: I unresolved some of the comments; I still think it would be good if we could more explicitly share logic with pointer-events:none by having a <dfn> in css3-ui (I'll defer to Domenic as to whether that's blocking or a follow-up issue); and do you know if rniwa has seen this?
